# The `DIArgList` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

List of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a>, to be used as an argument to a dbg.value intrinsic. <a href="#details">More...</a>
